Primeiro jogo que joguei na vida no já longínquo ano de 2006 na lan house. Torrei muito dinheiro lá, mas valeu a pena. Comprei só pra relembrar aquela época.
Me dá miedo este counter strike pero igual me gusta

1. best gameplay (shooting) out of every Counter Strike
2. graphics with very similar detail to CSGO but brighter and less gray
3. populated server browser with modded servers (no skill based matchmaking)

In my ideal universe:
1. CSGO never released
2. A competitive mode added to CS S
3. New (good) CS game on source 2 at some point

What is Counter-Strike: Source ?

The best CS game after CSGO, while I have a lot of respect for the original (and zero for condition zero), I still think that the original game holds up and is a good time to return all this years later, source is a upgrade for what they had with the original, while it doesnt introduce innovations like CSGO and isnt as fluid or polished or even modernized as that game, its still a very good pick especially for people who may not like the changes CSGO had and want a little more classic cs gameplay, imo GO is still the best but this one comes second, theres still a playerbase here with around 5k players daily at least so its not hard to find matches, its also a necessary game to own if you plan to play GMod as it fixes an infamous missing texture bug too, overall source is a fun online fps game that still have an alive and healthy community and its cheap, I recommend everyone to try all counter strike games once because those are one of the most fun online fps games you can have, all of them are cheap and worth playing, just skip condition zero, its the only one who isnt good.
